error-unknown: An unknown error occurred. If the problem persists, please seek assistance in our Community Forum or contact us at help@authgear.com
error-login-id-required: Please enter your {variant, select, phone{phone number} email {email address} username {username} other {email address or username}}.
error-oob-otp-code-required: Please enter the one-time password you just received.
error-totp-code-required: Please enter the 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device.
error-verification-code-required: Please enter the verification code you just received.
error-recovery-code-required: Please enter any unused 10-letter recovery code you stored previously.
error-confirm-password-required: Please enter your new password again.
error-phone-number-format: The phone number you entered is not in a correct format. Please select your country or region first, and then enter the phone number in the way that you dial it.
error-invalid-email: The email address you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure the email address has the @ sign, followed by the email domain, e.g. user@example.com
error-invalid-username: The username you entered is not in a correct format. Please try using a username consisting of alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, and 0-9) only.
error-totp-code-format: The code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-oob-otp-code-format: The one-time password you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-verification-code-format: The verification code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-recovery-code-format: The recovery code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 10-letter code.
error-uri-format: The URL you entered is not in a correct format. URLs typically start with https://, e.g. https://example.com/
error-email-not-allowed: The email address you entered is disallowed. Please contact the customer support if you think the email address should be valid.
error-username-not-allowed: The username you entered is disallowed. Please avoid using reserved usernames like `admin`.
error-phone-number-not-allowed: Phone number is from an unsupported region.
error-invalid-web3-network: Please sign up with {chainID, select, _1{Ethereum Mainnet} _5{Ethereum Goerli} _137{Polygon Mainnet} _80001{Polygon Mumbai} other{}} network.
error-account-not-found: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id {{ LoginIDTypeIncoming, select, email {This email} phone {This phone number} username {This username} other {This identity} }} oauth {This email} other {This identity} } cannot be found. Please ensure it is correct.
error-account-conflict: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id { { LoginIDTypeIncoming, select, email {This email} phone {This phone number} username {This username} other {This identity} } } oauth {This email} other {This identity} } is associated with an account.
error-suggestion-sign-in: { IntentKind, select, IntentAuthenticate {{ IdentityTypeExisting, select, login_id {Do you want to sign in with { LoginIDTypeExisting, select, email {email} phone {phone number} username {username} other {login ID} }?} oauth {Do you want to sign in with { OAuthProviderTypeExisting, select, google {Google} facebook {Facebook} github {GitHub} linkedin {LinkedIn} azureadv2 {Azure AD} azureadb2c {Azure AD B2C} adfs {AD FS} apple {Apple} wechat {Wechat} other {OAuth} }?} other {Do you want to sign in?} }} other {} }
error-suggestion-connect-oauth: { IntentKind, select, IntentAuthenticate {{ IdentityTypeExisting, select, login_id {{ IdentityTypeIncoming, select, oauth {You can link it with your { OAuthProviderTypeIncoming, select, google {Google} facebook {Facebook} github {GitHub} linkedin {LinkedIn} azureadv2 {Azure AD} azureadb2c {Azure AD B2C} adfs {AD FS} apple {Apple} wechat {Wechat} other {OAuth} } account via the settings page after signing in.} other {} }} other {} }} other {} }
error-invalid-credentials: {AuthenticationType, select, password{Incorrect password} totp{Incorrect 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device} oob_otp_sms {Incorrect one-time password} oob_otp_email{Incorrect one-time password} recovery_code {Incorrect recovery code} other {Invalid credentials}}
error-max-length: Expect string with length less than or equal to {expected, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
error-type: Please enter {expected, select, number{a number} integer{an integer} other{}}
error-minimum: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {minimum}
error-maximum: Please enter a number less than or equal to {maximum}
error-password-reset-failed: This reset password link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-no-authenticator: Your account does not have any usable authentication method to proceed. Please contact support.
error-duplicated-authenticator: {AuthenticatorType, select, oob_otp_sms{You have already set up this phone number for authentication. Maybe you want to set up another phone number?} oob_otp_email{You have already set up this email address for authentication. Maybe you want to set up another email address?} other{You have already set up this authenticator. Maybe want to set up another one?}}
error-developer-reauthentication: [To Developer] You just triggered reauthentication but the setup is incorrect. Please visit https://docs.authgear.com/integrate/reauthentication
error-developer-email-required: [To Developer] The OAuth provider does not return the email claim. If you expect the provider to always return the claim, please double check the configuration of your provider. If you expect the claim to be optional, please update the configuration of Authgear in the portal.
error-email-required-github: Please add a "Public Email" to your GitHub profile. Manage your profile here: https://github.com/settings/profile
error-verification-code-invalid: Verification code is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-remove-last-identity: You cannot disconnect the last identity. You need to keep at least 1 identity.
error-remove-last-primary-authenticator: You cannot remove the last primary authenticator. You need to keep at least 1 primary authenticator for an identity.
error-remove-last-secondary-authenticato: You cannot remove the last secondary authenticator. You need to keep at least 1 secondary authenticator to keep 2-step verification enabled.
error-new-password-typo: The re-typed new password does not match the new password. Please ensure the two match.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-retry:
This page is invalid or has expired.

Please return and retry your request.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-return:
This page is invalid or has expired.

Please return and retry your request.
error-rate-limited: Please wait for a moment before retrying.
error-sms-send-limit-exceeded: You have exceeded the limit of sending one-time passwords. Please try again later.
error-usage-limit-exceeded: [To Developer] Your project has exceeded the usage limit. Please review your subscription.
error-webhook-invalid-response: [To Developer] Your webhook handler did NOT return a valid response. Please visit https://docs.authgear.com/webhooks/webhooks
error-webhook-delivery-timeout: Operation is disallowed because the webhook delivery resulted in timeout.
error-scheduled-deletion-by-admin: Administrator has disabled your account and your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}
error-scheduled-deletion-by-end-user: You have deactivated your account and your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}

error-invalid-selected-image: The selected image is invalid. Try another one.

v2-error-scheduled-deletion-by-end-user: You have deactivated your account and your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}
v2-error-new-password-typo: The re-entered new password does not match the new password. Please ensure the two match.
v2-error-account-conflict: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id {{FlowType, select, login {Looks like you used {OAuthProviderNameExisting} for login before.} other {This {LoginIDNameIncoming} is already registered.}}} oauth {Looks like you haven''t linked up with that {OAuthProviderNameIncoming} account yet.} other {This account is already registered} }
v2-error-suggestion-account-conflict-oau: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id {You can try login with {OAuthProviderNameExisting} or use another {LoginIDNameIncoming} below.} oauth {You can try another {OAuthProviderNameIncoming} account{ IdentityTypeExisting, select, login_id { or use your {LoginIDNameExisting} below.} other {or use another method below.} }} other {You can try another account.} }
v2-setup-oob-otp-without-verification: Sign in with one-time password via {target} next time
v2-enter-recovery-code-description-reaut: For your security, we need to verify it''s you. Enter an unused 10-character recovery code.
v2-change-password-page-subtitle: For account security, please change your password.
v2-forgot-password-otp-description: We''ve just sent a {CodeLength}-digit verification code to {MaskedClaimValue}.
v2-forgot-password-otp-description--what: We''ve just sent a {CodeLength}-digit verification code to your WhatsApp number at {MaskedClaimValue}.
v2-verify-login-link-description: Click the button to confirm login for {AppOrClientName}.
v2-verify-login-link-invalid-description: This link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
v2-verify-login-link-approved-descriptio:
You''ve approved the login for {AppOrClientName}.
You can close this window.
v2-prompt-create-passkey-description: With Passkeys you can now use your fingerprint, face, or screen lock to verify it''s really you.
v2-use-passkey-description: Log in using the button below.
v2-use-passkey-description-reauth: For your security, we need to verify it''s you. Log in using the button below.
v2-reset-password-page-subtitle: Create a new password that complies with security requirements.
v2-reset-password-success-page-descripti:
Your password successfully updated!
You can now log in using the new password.
v2-error-password-reset-failed-descripti: This reset password link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
v2-setup-totp-description:
First, download Google Authenticator App from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.

Scan the QR code or enter the key with your authenticator device / app.
v2-setup-totp-verify-description: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator device/app.
v2-enter-totp-description: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator device/app.
v2-enter-totp-description-reauth: For your security, we need to verify it''s you. Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator device/app.
v2-login-link-otp-initial-description: We''ve just sent a login link to {target}. If not received, please resend.
v2-login-link-otp-initial-description-re: For your security, we need to verify it''s you. We''ve just sent a login link to {target}. If not received, please resend.
v2-login-link-otp-invalid-code-descripti: This login link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
v2-login-link-otp-matched-description: Your email has been successfully verified. Start exploring now.
v2-confirm-terminate-other-sessions-desc: You''re logged in on another device. Continuing will log out from other devices.
v2-toc-pp-footer: By registering, you agree to the {variant, select, both{Terms of Service and Privacy Policy} termsOnly{Terms of Service} privacyOnly{Privacy Policy} other{}}
v2-error-account-not-found: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id {{ LoginIDTypeIncoming, select, email {This email} phone {This phone number} username {This username} other {This identity} }} oauth {This email} other {This identity} } cannot be found. Do you want to create an account?
v2-login-id-name: { LoginIDType, select, email {email} phone {phone number} username {username} other {{ LoginIDKey, select, email {email} phone {phone number} username {username} other {identity} }} }
v2-oauth-provider-name: { OAuthProviderType, select, google {Google} facebook {Facebook} github {GitHub} linkedin {LinkedIn} azureadv2 {Azure AD} azureadb2c {Azure AD B2C} adfs {AD FS} apple {Apple} wechat {Wechat} other {OAuth} }
v2-error-network: There was a problem performing this action. Please try again
v2-error-password-change-password-reused: Please provide a new password that is different from the previous one.
v2-wechat-auth-page-app-description: Click the below button to continue WeChat Login
v2-wechat-auth-page-with-qr-code-descrip: Please scan the QR code in your WeChat app to sign in.
v2-account-linking-subtitle--login-and-l: Seems like you have signed up before. Log in to an existing account to link it.
v2-account-linking-subtitle--login: Seems like you have signed up before. Log in to an existing account below.
v2-csrf-error-message: An error occured. Make sure cookies are enabled and try again.
v2-csrf-error-instruction-chrome-desktop: At the top right, click More "" → Settings. Or visit chrome://settings/content/siteData
Click Additional content settings → On-device site data.
Select "Allow sites to save data on your device"
v2-csrf-error-instruction-android-step1: On your Android device, open Chrome
v2-csrf-error-instruction-android-step2: To the right of the address bar, tap More "" and then Settings
v2-csrf-error-instruction-android-step3: Under "Advanced" tab Site settings → On-device site data.
v2-csrf-error-instruction-samsung-step1: Open the "Settings" app in your system
v2-csrf-error-instruction-default-step3: Allow cookies or On-device site data
v2.page.settings.default.description-my-: This is the method to sign in to your account
v2.page.settings.default.description-sec: These can be used to make sure that it''s really you signing in
